Title: Granddad's Fight
Plot: Grandad and Colonel Stinkmeaner have a beef. One man's blind. One man's feeble. Both are really, really old. Let "The Slugfest In Woodcrest" commence!
ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language, drug use and sexual content that may offend
GuestStars: Miguel Sandoval (Various),   Terry Crews (Nigga),   Jim Meskimen (Colonel Stinkmeaner),   Maria Canals (Spanish reporter)
